robot_controller.cpp

1 /* Libraries */
2 #include "miro_teleop/Path.h"
3 #include "ros/ros.h"
4 #include "std_msgs/Bool.h"
5 #include "miro_msgs/platform_control.h"
6 #include "geometry_msgs/Pose2D.h"
7 #include "geometry_msgs/Twist.h"
8 #include <vector>
9 #include <cmath>
10 
11 /* Global variables */
12 bool enable = false; // Controller status flag
13 std::vector<geometry_msgs::Vector3> path; // Trajectory array
14 geometry_msgs::Pose2D robot; // Robot position
15 geometry_msgs::Pose2D gesture; // Gesture position
16 
21 void getPoint(const miro_teleop::Path::ConstPtr& points)
22 {
23  /* Append every path position received to current reference path */
24  path.clear();
25  // path = points->path;
26  ROS_INFO("Received new path");
27  for(int i=0;i< points->path.size();i++)
28  path.push_back(points->path[i]);
29 }
30 
35 void getStatus(const std_msgs::Bool::ConstPtr& status)
36 {
37  enable = status->data;
38  if(enable) ROS_INFO("Controller enabled");
39  else ROS_INFO("Controller disabled");
40 }
41 
46 void getRobotPose(const geometry_msgs::Pose2D::ConstPtr& pose)
47 {
48  robot.x = 100*pose->x; //in cm
49  robot.y = 100*pose->y; //in cm
50  robot.theta = pose->theta;
51 }
52 
57 void getCommanderPose(const geometry_msgs::Pose2D::ConstPtr& pose)
58 {
59  gesture.x = 100*pose->x;
60  gesture.y = 100*pose->y;
61 }
62 
78 int main(int argc, char **argv)
79 {
80  /* Definitions */
81  geometry_msgs::Vector3 ref; // Reference position (from trajectory)
82  geometry_msgs::Pose2D commPos; // Commander position
83  double dr, dtheta; // Linear and angular displacements
84  double ktheta = 1; // Angular control gain
85  double vr, vtheta; // Desired linear and angular velocities
86  miro_msgs::platform_control cmd_vel; // Message to be published
87  double tol = 20.0; // Displacement tolerance (in cm)
88  bool turn_blink;
89 
90  /* Initialize and assign node handler */
91  ros::init(argc, argv, "robot_controller");
92  ros::NodeHandle n;
93 
94  /* Initialize publishers and subscribers */
95  ros::Publisher ctl_pub =
96  n.advertise<miro_msgs::platform_control>
97  ("/miro/rob01/platform/control", 10);
98  ros::Subscriber path_sub =
99  n.subscribe("path", 1, getPoint);
100  ros::Subscriber en_sub =
101  n.subscribe("enable", 1, getStatus);
102  ros::Subscriber mocap_sub =
103  n.subscribe("Robot/ground_pose", 10, getRobotPose);
104  ros::Subscriber gest_sub =
105  n.subscribe("Gesture/ground_pose", 10, getCommanderPose);
106 
107  /* Update rate (period) */
108  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
109 
110  ROS_INFO("Robot Controller node active");
111 
112  /* Main loop */
113  while (ros::ok())
114  {
115 
116  /* Perform control only with flag enabled */
117  if(enable)
118  {
119  ref = path.front();
120  /* Compute displacements */
121  dr = sqrt(pow(ref.x-robot.x,2)+pow(ref.y-robot.y,2));
122  dtheta = atan2(ref.y-robot.y,ref.x-robot.x)-robot.theta;
123  dtheta = atan2(sin(dtheta),cos(dtheta));
124 
125  /* Verify if the robot is close enough to target */
126  if(dr<=tol)
127  {
128  /* Obtain new reference position */
129  if(!path.empty())
130  {
131  ref = path.front();
132  path.erase(path.begin());
133  }
134  else
135  {
136  /* If path is empty, disable control */
137  enable = false;
138  ROS_INFO("Goal position reached");
139  ROS_INFO("Controller disabled");
140 
141  // Then MiRo turn and blink to commander
142  turn_blink = true;
143  }
144  }
145  else
146  {
147 
148  /* Obtain reference speeds (linear/angular) */
149  vr = 200*cos(dtheta); // Max speed: 400 cm/s
150  vtheta = ktheta*dtheta; // P angular control
151 
152  /* Compose message and publish */
153  cmd_vel.body_vel.linear.x = vr;
154  cmd_vel.body_vel.angular.z = vtheta;
155  ctl_pub.publish(cmd_vel);
156 
157  ROS_INFO("Position reference: (%f, %f)",
158  ref.x,ref.y);
159  ROS_INFO("Robot position: (%f, %f)",
160  robot.x,robot.y);
161  ROS_INFO("Displacement: (%f, %f)",dr,dtheta);
162  ROS_INFO("Set speed linear %f, angular %f\n",
163  vr,vtheta);
164  }
165  }
166  else
167  {
168  if(turn_blink)
169  {
170  commPos = gesture;
171  dtheta = atan2(commPos.y-robot.y,
172  commPos.x-robot.x)-robot.theta;
173  dtheta = atan2(sin(dtheta),cos(dtheta));
174  cmd_vel.body_vel.linear.x = 0;
175  cmd_vel.body_vel.linear.z = dtheta;
176  cmd_vel.blink_time = 10; // 200ms blink
177  ctl_pub.publish(cmd_vel);
178  if(dtheta<0.1) turn_blink = false;
179  }
180  else
181  {
182  /* Otherwise send a null velocity to robot */
183  cmd_vel.body_vel.linear.x = 0.0;
184  cmd_vel.body_vel.angular.z = 0.0;
185  ctl_pub.publish(cmd_vel);
186  }
187  }
188 
189  /* Spin and wait for next period */
190  ros::spinOnce();
191  loop_rate.sleep();
192  }
193 
194  return 0;
195 }
